vote.title: Authorize acquisition of a wastewater easement from Dallas Area Rapid Transit (“DART”), of approximately 5,382 square feet of land located near the intersection of North Central Expressway and Royal Lane for the Dallas Water Utilities Engineering Contract 16-351/E Wastewater Mains Project - Not to exceed $45,000.00 ($43,543.00, plus closing costs and title expenses not to exceed $1,457.00) - Financing: Wastewater Capital Improvement F Fund
vote.description: Authorize acquisition of a wastewater easement from Dallas Area Rapid Transit (“DART”), of approximately 5,382 square feet of land located near the intersection of North Central Expressway and Royal Lane for the Dallas Water Utilities Engineering Contract 16-351/E Wastewater Mains Project - Not to exceed $45,000.00 ($43,543.00, plus closing costs and title expenses not to exceed $1,457.00) - Financing: Wastewater Capital Improvement F Fund
